main event: A witness reported seeing a large, oval-shaped object with red lights hovering near Piqua, Ohio, on May 31, 1965.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a blimp but was later described as an unidentified flying object with unusual movement,The object made no sound and had blinking red lights on the bottom,At one point, the object hovered and then accelerated away at high speed,The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes,Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings around the same time.
sighted object: large oval-shaped object with blinking red lights
witness description: the witness reported being a civilian who observed the object at night
